content: One of the folks I just texted with said she is signed up to be a data captain. I have 35 years of data management and analysis. so it sounds like something I could contribute to.  How do I find out how to get involved?

Hi Karen, in my opinion our “data captain” role is a bit more of a tech support role on Zoom than data-related, but we definitely still need help! I recommend you sign up for the training below and see if it’s a good fit for you!

https://events.democrats.org/event/654890/
